bib.title: Sentiment analysis with contextual embeddings and self-attention
bib.author: Biesialska, Katarzyna and Biesialska, Magdalena and Rybinski, Henryk
bib.abstract: ELMo we are able to feed our classifier model with context-aware embeddings of an input  sequence. Hence, in this setting we do not perform any fine-tuning of ELMo  models leveraging  contextual embeddings (CoVe+BCN, Polish BERT, ELMo+GloVe+BCN and ELMo+TSA)
bib.booktitle: International Symposium on Methodologies for Intelligent Systems
